props.name: direction
props.docblock: Specifies direction of the children blocks (column/row).

description.text: Specifies direction of the children blocks (column/row).

props.name: gap
props.docblock:
Specifies inner space between children blocks.

Valid values are based on `the spacing classes`:
`0, 0.5, ... 6`.

description.text:
Specifies inner space between children blocks.

Valid values are based on `the spacing classes`:
`0, 0.5, ... 6`.

props.name: reversed
props.docblock: Specifies the order of the children.

description.text: Specifies the order of the children.

props.name: className
props.docblock: Specifies an additional `className` to add to the base element.

description.text: Specifies an additional `className` to add to the base element.
